device_settings.info: This database contains the settings for the hardware used in the AtomChip experiment. The channel_config element contains the configuration for each channel. Its has a name attribute, which names the channel it describes. Note that you can use comments LOG:

stages.comment: The colour of the stage is that shown in the script editor. It is a Hexidecimal number encoding a labview colour. The encoding is RRGGBB therefore red is FF0000, blue is 00FF00, and green is 0000FF.

channel_config.name: Ao8a_Ao_00
channel_config.comment: Cooling detuning is the voltage supplied to the vco on the double pass 210 MHz AOM. It sets the overall detuning of the laser. User enters detuning in MHz

triggering.comment: SpinCoreDDS0_rf_trigger is currently on Dio64_Do_12. internal uses a software trigger
SpinCoreDDS1_rf_trigger is on Dio64_Do_13. internal uses a software trigger
CQTDDS0_rf_trigger is currently on Dio64_Do_12. internal uses a software trigger
